name: Protogonus
description:
How does one escape the endless cycle of life and death? It's simple infact... since immortality is impossible one just needs to KILL EVERYTHING AND WATCH THE WORLD BURN TO THE GROUND!!!!       or you could just play this game and practice your world annihilations skills and strategic mind at the same time ;).

Made in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 46 game jam. All art and sound was made during the jam.
